alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:28PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lemhi County through 415 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilmore, or 39 miles northeast of Mackay Reservoir, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gilmore and Nicholia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
